meanings.definition: The act of misorienting or the state of being misoriented.
meanings.sent1: The misorientations of the map led us in the wrong direction.
meanings.sent2: The misorientations of the compass confused the hikers.
meanings.sent3: The misorientations of the GPS made us take a scenic route.
meanings.sent4: Her misorientations in the new city made her feel lost in a sea of unfamiliar streets.
meanings.sent5: The misorientations of the stars guided the ancient sailors across the vast ocean.

meanings.sent1: The misorientations of the painting made it look crooked on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The misorientations of the chair made it uncomfortable to sit on.
meanings.sent3: The misorientations of the road signs caused confusion for the drivers.
meanings.sent4: His misorientations in the maze led him to dead ends repeatedly.
meanings.sent5: The misorientations of the building's layout made it hard to find the exit during the fire drill.
